replies.body: It's when Sivir shows up at your door in a Dominoes uniform and you're thinking she's the pizza delivery girl, but, instead, she cuts your feet off with the pizza in her hand so as to package your feet and ship them off to Big Pizza because that's what Canadian Bacon is. Human feet. But this fact was revealed to us on Dateline and now Big Pizza is being sued for billions by the US government and the case is known as the Pizza Feet case.

Having Doritos/Pizza Slices for feet, Back then Champions weren't as detailed in terms of visual design. 
For example, here's Taric before his 2016 Update.
https://www.gamasutra.com/db_area/images/blog/271074/d24b4-taricturn.jpg

It's related to the "(>" shapes some old models have for their feet. This heavily resembles a slice of pizza when looked at from the right angle, hence the term "pizza feet".

Sometimes this is extended to general blocky feet that don't *quite* meet that definition as well.
It means the character that has feet shaped like V instead of looking more like an actual foot.
